entry.title: a hauntingly hot christmas (ho ho horror!)
entry.summary:
Author: purplyknow

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,526Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 132

Summary: ‚ÄúPlease. Can we‚Ä¶ can we just have sex?‚Äù The question hung in the air; insane and just absolutely incredulous. Minho, the demon feared by even his own kind, could do nothing but just stare. His bloodshot eyes wide with what looked like a mixture of disbelief, incredulity and rage. He didn't answer, couldn't answer. Hell he had no answer. He had nothing to pull out, had no frame of reference for any of this. Chan didn‚Äôt wait for one. He couldn't. The last thread of his sanity had snapped, officially. He needed to feel something other than this soul-crushing emptiness. He needed a distraction, a violent, consuming act to blot out the memory of his girlfriend‚Äôs betrayal. He stepped back, his hands fumbling with the hem of his shirt, and in one fluid motion, stripped it off. (Or; It's Christmas eve and Chan had caught his girlfriend cheating on him. Pushed past his breaking point, he does the unthinkable and pulls the terrifying ghost/demon that has long tormented him for a kiss. He somehow doesn't get torn apart, and istead, he gets a reaction. Chan, miserable, desperate to forget and just longing for any kind of connection, decides to take things a step further.)

entry.title: Love, With Consequences
entry.summary:
Author: polahusband

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,354Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 11

Summary: In the Stray Kids dorm, love isn‚Äôt simple‚Äîit‚Äôs messy, intense, and sometimes‚Ä¶ dangerously playful. Lee Know and Han Jisung have been together for years, navigating a relationship built on trust, desire, and the occasional lesson in consequence. Their quiet, intimate battles of control and surrender are a language all their own‚Äîwhere punishment is never cruelty, but care. Across the dorm, desire simmers in secret. Bang Chan, Hyunjin, and Felix pine for each other in ways that no one dares to voice, while Seungmin and Changbin explore a friendship with boundaries that blur in the dark. Even the youngest, I.N, walks a solitary path, quietly observing the heat, longing, and chaos around him. This is a story of longing and possession, of trust and temptation, of hearts tangled in years of affection, lust, and complicated devotion. In this dorm, love comes with consequences‚Äîand sometimes, the sweetest consequences are the ones you never see coming.

entry.title: Sugar
entry.summary:
Author: Changbinsthang

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 52,763Chapters: 13/15Kudos: 186

Summary: Twenty-eight thousand, six hundred seventy-six dollars and forty-nine cents. That‚Äôs how much debt he was in after his tuition balance finally posted. Felix stared at the number, numb. His adrenaline had spiked so fast that now his hands tingled, his stomach twisted hollow, and a cold sweat clung to the back of his neck. He was officially at rock bottom‚Äîwith absolutely no idea how to climb out. Tears pricked behind his eyes, hot and humiliating. Felix swallowed. And then it came back‚Äîthat thought. That dangerous, glowing idea that had been flickering in the back of his mind every time he looked at his boss. He‚Äôd spent the last week and a half pushing it down. Forcing it down. Trying to bury it beneath professionalism and pride. But what was wrong with‚Ä¶asking? Not that word. Not outright. Just an offer. A proposal. The worst he could do was say no. --- Felix is technically Chris' sugar baby but it's never outright said.

entry.title: Waiting For Us
entry.summary:
Author: quietmidnights

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 135,755Chapters: 15/15Kudos: 163

Summary: ‚ÄúChannie?‚Äù Felix whispers. He says it so quietly that Chan is only able to hear it because he saw his lips move. Chan nods. ‚ÄúChannie‚Äôs here, baby.‚Äù ‚ÄúC-Can I come over there?‚Äù ‚ÄúOf course,‚Äù Chan says softly. ‚ÄúAnd y-you won‚Äôt hurt me?‚Äù Chan doesn't let his tears fall. ‚ÄúNo, baby, I won‚Äôt hurt you. Never.‚Äù ‚ÄúDo you promise?‚Äù ‚ÄúI promise, Lix. I swear on my life.‚Äù He watches Felix swallow. ‚ÄúO-Okay,‚Äù he says quietly.When Chan first met Felix, he was quiet, bruised, and flinching at everything around him. Time softened fear into trust, and trust into an easy, sweet friendship ‚Äì one where everyone knew Felix was Chan‚Äôs favorite, and Chan was Felix‚Äôs safe space. But when feelings change into something new and a different kind of love starts to unfurl, Felix‚Äôs old fears resurface. Muscle memory developed through trauma and pain fights against the gentleness he knows he can trust. For Chan, loving Felix is so, so easy. It‚Äôs full of soft words, a steady presence, gentle care, unwavering kindness, and letting him move at his own pace until he can truly believe that this love is different, that he is safe, and that he will never be hurt again.
